project(brotli)
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 23)

if (MSVC)
	set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} /wd4061 /wd4100 /wd4127 /wd4464 /wd4820")
endif()

include_directories(
	"${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}"
	"${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include"
)

file(
	GLOB SRC_FILES 
	"${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/dec/*.c"
	"${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/*.c"
)
add_library(brotli STATIC ${SRC_FILES})
